options.label: figures-side
options.fig.cap: Figure 1.1: Single chip control (a) The second chip of day  E8.5 shows no salience. (b) The first chip of day E12.5 is noticeably lighter in intensity in comparison to other chips.

Figure 3.1.1: Reduction of dimensions and indirect Quality Control.The 20 chips are shown as data points that contain gene expression as features, respectively as loadings for the principle components (PCs). The first 14 PCs  add up to 95% of cumulative proportion. Hence the remaining 6 were removed before further dimensionality reduction. The plots show PC1 plotted against PC2 and PC2 plotted against PC3. Each colour represents microarray data from the same day.t-SNE and UMAP further reduce the 14 dimensions given by PCA into 2 dimensions with maximal maintenance of information and clusters.
